meanings: (필요한 것을) look[search] for, obtain, (formal) seek; (찾아내다) find (out); (얻다) get
(조언·양해·용서 등을) ask (for), request, (formal) seek, turn to (=청하다)
(위험에서) rescue[save] (sb from sth), (곤경에서) (formal) extricate (sb from sth)

phrases.phrase: 일자리 구하는 건 어떻게 되고 있어요?
meanings: 구직활동 How's the job search coming along?
미술 Theseus Freeing Children from the Minotaur

vlive.korean: 이거 그럼 못 구하는 거야? Then can I not buy this? 듣기 View video IU : [IU TV] 아이유 분노의 쇼핑
vlive.english: Then can I not buy this?

vlive.korean: [동의를 구하는 간절한 눈빛] 그렇죠? [Desperate eyes seeking consent] Right? 듣기 View video TWICE : TWICE TV “34th Golden Disc Awards DAY 1”
인천광역시 무슨 무슨 구 하는 것처럼? - 도시 맞는 거 같은데? 주는 아니지만... It's just like districts within Incheon? - I think it is! It's not a state, but... 듣기 View video BLACKPINK : 🖤3주년💖
vlive.english: It's just like districts within Incheon? - I think it is! It's not a state, but...

vlive.korean: 미리 양해를 구하는 거예요. We're asking for your understanding in advance. 듣기 View video fromis_9 : 나랑 너랑 🌙
vlive.english: We're asking for your understanding in advance.

vlive.korean: [도움을 구하는 눈빛] 꼴찌를 그거는... [Eyes searching for help] If you come in last... 듣기 View video Dispatch : [ⓓxV] “뉴이스트 7주년 워크샵➀” (뉴이스트:NU’EST)
vlive.english: [Eyes searching for help] If you come in last...

examples.korean: He disdained to turn to his son for advice. 발음듣기 그는 아들에게 조언을 구하는 것을 거부했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He disdained to turn to his son for advice. 발음

examples.korean: an attention/a publicity seeker 발음듣기 관심을 구하는 사람/명성을 추구하는[좇는] 사람 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
How’s the job-hunting going? 발음듣기 직장 구하는 일은 어떻게 되어 가죠? Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
He placed a lonely hearts ad in a magazine. 발음듣기 그는 한 잡지에 애인을 구하는 광고를 냈다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He placed a lonely hearts ad in a magazine. 발음

examples.korean: So far I have had no luck with finding a job. 발음듣기 지금까지는 내가 직장을 구하는 데 운이 없었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: So far I have had no luck with finding a job. 발음
